actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee Filed by Levitas. Discharge Petition No: 02.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 220) to amend title 5, United States Code, to make regulations more cost-effective, to ensure review of rules, to improve regulatory planning and management, to enhance public participation in the regulatory process, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 220 (agency rulemaking).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 220) to amend title 5, United States Code, to make regulations more cost-effective, to ensure review of rules, to improve regulatory planning and management, to enhance public participation in the regulatory process, and for other purposes.
